trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> class provides the necessary storage members and methods to retrieve all pertinent information about the installed image encoders and decoders (called codecs).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> 類別提供必要的儲存成員和方法，以擷取已安裝之影像編碼器和解碼器 (稱為轉碼器) 的所有相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Not inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: GDI+ uses image encoders to convert the images stored in <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> objects to various file formats.
trans-unit.target: GDI + 轉換的映像儲存在使用影像編碼器<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>物件至各種檔案格式。

trans-unit.source: Image encoders are built into GDI+ for the BMP, JPEG, GIF, TIFF, and PNG formats.
trans-unit.target: 影像轉碼器是內建 GDI + BMP、 JPEG、 GIF、 TIFF 和 PNG 格式。

trans-unit.source: An encoder is invoked when you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Image.SaveAdd%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Image> object.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫時，會叫用編碼器<xref:System.Drawing.Image.Save%2A>或<xref:System.Drawing.Image.SaveAdd%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Image>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that contains a GUID that identifies a specific codec.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 結構，含有識別特定 Codec 的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that contains a GUID that identifies a specific codec.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 結構，含有識別特定 Codec 的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that contains the name of the codec.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定含有 Codec 的名稱之字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the codec.
trans-unit.target: 字串，含有 Codec 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets string that contains the path name of the DLL that holds the codec.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，這個字串含有存留 Codec 的 DLL 路徑名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the codec is not in a DLL, this pointer is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Codec 不是在 DLL 中，則這個指標為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path name of the DLL that holds the codec.
trans-unit.target: 字串，含有存留 Codec 的 DLL 路徑名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets string that contains the file name extension(s) used in the codec.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定含有在 Codec 中所使用副檔名的字串。

trans-unit.source: The extensions are separated by semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 副檔名是以分號隔開。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the file name extension(s) used in the codec.
trans-unit.target: 字串，含有在 Codec 中所使用的副檔名。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets 32-bit value used to store additional information about the codec.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 32 位元值，用來儲存 Codec 的相關額外資訊。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a combination of flags from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecFlags" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecFlags" /> 列舉型別 (Enumeration) 傳回旗標組合。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit value used to store additional information about the codec.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元值，用來儲存 Codec 的相關額外資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that describes the codec's file format.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定描述 Codec 的檔案格式之字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the codec's file format.
trans-unit.target: 字串，描述 Codec 的檔案格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that contains a GUID that identifies the codec's format.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 結構，含有識別 Codec 的格式之 GUID。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that contains a GUID that identifies the codec's format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 結構，含有識別 Codec 的格式之 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> objects that contain information about the image decoders built into GDI+.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> 物件的陣列，物件含有內建於 GDI+ 的影像解碼器相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Each <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> object in the array contains information about one of the built-in image decoders.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的每個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> 物件包含其中一個內建影像解碼器的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo.GetImageEncoders%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo.GetImageEncoders%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> objects that contain information about the image encoders built into GDI+.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> 物件的陣列，物件含有內建於 GDI+ 的影像編碼器相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Each <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> object in the array contains information about one of the built-in image encoders.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的每個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo" /> 物件包含其中一個內建影像編碼器的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，這是參數的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo.GetImageEncoders%2A> method to retrieve all the codec information for all installed image encoders and codecs, and then draws all the information about each codec to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageCodecInfo.GetImageEncoders%2A>方法來擷取所有已安裝的影像編碼器和轉碼器，所有的轉碼器資訊，然後繪製每個轉碼器的所有資訊到螢幕。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that contains the codec's Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，含有 Codec 的多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extension，MIME) 類型。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the codec's Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type.
trans-unit.target: 字串，含有 Codec 的多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 (MIME) 類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a two dimensional array of bytes that can be used as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可以做為篩選條件的位元組二維陣列。

trans-unit.source: A two dimensional array of bytes that can be used as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 位元組的二維陣列，可以做為篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a two dimensional array of bytes that represents the signature of the codec.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示 Codec 的簽章之位元組二維陣列。

trans-unit.source: A two dimensional array of bytes that represents the signature of the codec.
trans-unit.target: 位元組二維陣列，表示 Codec 的簽章。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version number of the codec.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Codec 的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The version number of the codec.
trans-unit.target: Codec 的版本號碼。
